Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Beta-defensin 131 (Beta-defensin 31, DEFB-31; Defensin, beta 131; Human, mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Highly expressed in testis. Is moderately expressed in the prostate and small intestine.
